Name: Burnice
Desc: Use it to obtain the Agent or unlock the Agent's Mindscapes.
Desc2:
Snapshots from Burnice's daily life and from in combat, recording important moments before and after she became an Agent.
These images also provide insights into her fighting style and favorite weapons, helping to better understand her strengths.
The scene is filled with numerous delicious-looking Nitro-Fuel cocktails. Tasting these drinks would undoubtedly bring the same happiness that Burnice feels...
